author: pete
msg: wicket's encoding for resources is UTF-8 but DatesPickerTest did not use the proper encoding and eventually fails if the platform encoding does not match

author: blair
msg: Document that the input svn_error_t * can be NULL or SVN_NO_ERROR.

author: blair
msg: Replace svn_error_has_cause() with svn_error_find_cause() that instead
of returning a Boolean, returns the actual matching cause.  Users can
still use a Boolean context to determine if there was a match, so
there's no drawback to this change.
Renamed from svn_error_has_cause().  Change the return type from
Refer to the new function name.
